productfeatures: Face Detection, Image Stabilization, Panorama Mode
dimensions: 2.2 inches high x 3.7 inches wide x 0.7 inches deep
interface: AV output, HDMI A (full size), micro USB, USB 2.0, built-in flash, built-in Wi-Fi
focusingtype: Active Auto, Active Infra-Red Auto, Manual/Automatic, Passive Auto, TTL Contrast Detection
zoom: The camera's 5x optical zoom lens has a focal length range of 25-125mm (35mm equivalent) and a fast aperture of f/2.5 - 6.3
display: 2.7-inch 460K dot rear LCD and 1.5-inch front LCD. The remote viewfinder function enables you to control your camera by using your smartphone as the viewfinder
